Independent study with Dr. Shalom Ruben from the University of Colorado. Project utilizes CUDA for mobile phone game automation with the Nvidia Jetson Nano.
Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy - Tower Mounted Camera

Aided in the implementation of an automated ground-based solution for external blade inspections. Developed a smart-recognition script using OpenCV to locate the blade tip and follow blade profile to the blade root.

openCVpythonR&D
Senior Design Project

Designed and integrated a motorized fixture to remotely rotate a 500 lb inertia through a GUI hosted on a Raspberry Pi. Implemented a live video feed to remotely monitor and fine-tune the system.

arduionpythonintegrationtesting
Automated Quality Control Unit

Re-designed a manual pressure test unit to create an automated solution. The micro-controller powering the logic of the device is a Itsy Bitsy. The peripherals of the unit include a differential pressure transducer, thermo-couple, pump, heater, fan, solenoid valves, flow sensor, and more.

Cmicrocontrollerintegration
Quanser Control Modules

Implemented control techniques on a variety of electro-mechanical systems using Matlab and Simulink with Quanser hardware.

control theoryMatlabSimulink
HASEL Soft Actuators

Bob-Ross themed introductory video to creating hydraulically amplified self-healing electro-static actuators

flexible actuatorscinematographylaser cutting
Digital Control with NI myRIO

Implemented digital control techniques on NI hardware with LabVIEW.

control theoryLabVIEW
